UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antibacterial Activity and Toxicity of Analogs of Scorpion Venom IsCT Peptides.
Literature.Author: de la Salud Bea R, Petraglia AF, Ascuitto MR, Buck QM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>100µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=>100µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>100µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=>100µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µg/ml)
